name: Secret Code Cracker
description:
Object of the game is to determine the secret code. You have to discover a secret code 3 or 4 or 5-digits.

Green - you see the correct number.

Orange - number that are part of the code but are not in the right place

Red - wrong number.

Great graphics and exciting sound effects

Select game size from 3, 4 or 5 numbers code combinations.
